title: Martin Odegaard: How Arsenal captain set unwanted injury record
description: Arsenal continue their strong start to the season with victory over West Ham - but Martin Odegaard sets an unwanted record.
content:
Just three days after a "phenomenal" display against Olympiakos in the Champions League, things are not looking so positive once again for Martin Odegaard.

title: Sesko eases pressure on Amorim as Manchester United avoid Sunderland slip
description: First-half goals from Mason Mount and Benjamin Sesko gave Manchester United a 2-0 Premier League victory against Sunderland
content:
Ruben Amorim will be pleased the only storm Manchester United had to navigate was provided by the skies. The head coach witnessed a rare comfortable victory against Sunderland to alleviate the pressure on him for a fortnight at least.

title: Storm Amy batters Britain with cars smashed and trees downed as weather warning extended
description: Tens of thousands of people were left without power on Saturday
content: Storm Amy has caused widespread disruption across the UK and Ireland for a second consecutive day, leaving thousands of homes without power and forcing the closure of parks, railway lines, and ferry routes as winds of up to 100mph batter parts of the... [2410 chars]

title: Populist billionaire Andrej Babis’s party set to win Czech election
description: With most votes tallied, Babis’s ANO party is ahead, but it appears set to fall short of a majority in parliament.
content:
Billionaire Andrej Babis’s populist ANO party has taken a commanding lead in the Czech Republic’s parliamentary election, but is on track to fall short of a majority.

title: 'Gutted' Jamie Borthwick's Merc breaks down on date as he's seen for first time since EastEnders sack
description: AXED actor Jamie Borthwick is pictured for the first time since his sacking from EastEnders.But his outing hit the skids when his Mercedes broke down
content:
AXED actor Jamie Borthwick is pictured for the first time since his sacking from EastEnders.
